name: Zany Face
baseMeaning: A face with tongue out, tilted head, and one big eye.
tldr: Wild, silly, crazy energy. The 'I'm being weird on purpose' face.

contextMeanings.meaning: Being silly, wild, or intentionally crazy.

Used in fun stories and goofy posts.
Common in self-deprecating and wild-moment posts.

generationalNotes.note: Represents chaotic energy and being unhinged.
Used for silly and playful moments.
May find it confusing or childish.
